name: Pastèque
description:
Pastèque is good, Pastèque is life, run for Pastèque.

Rolling bawl game for one player, Try to finish the game and do the best scores by eating Pastèque.

The Game Designer Team

Mathieu Botella (Matelpitou : https://matelpitou.itch.io/ )

Elouann Giacomoni (Mordekayy : https://mordekayy.itch.io/  )
